entry.title: Un-Oaked Summer 6-Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Barriques WBS
Type:
Price: 69.99

Please step aside Mr. Wood.  Finn has put together a refreshing, un-oaked wine 6-pack to help you stay cool and crisp during these dog days of Summer.  It's a stellar deal for these six stellar bottles of vino.  Enjoy.

2019 Le Paradou Viognier - A richer style of Viognier giving up fresh aromas of peach blossom, green pear and ripe melon. 
 2018 Cuvee 3 Messes Basses Rose - A fresh and fleshy dry rosé with a crisp mouth, supple and light, with expressive perfumes of red fruits and berries. 
2019 Domaine des Homs Minervois Rose -  Vibrant, elegant and well balanced on the palate.
2019 Honig Sauvignon Blanc - Organically produced. Bright acidity and crisp freshness, with flavors of juicy peach, passion fruit, and grapefruit, and the enticing aromas of jasmine and lemon zest. Medium-bodied, with a lingering finish.
2018 Laplaya Chardonnay -Un-oaked.  A lively vibrancy of bright citrus, apple notes balance out the weight of the tropical fruit flavors to give an effortless impression on the palate.  
2018 Acrobat Pinot Gris - Light, fresh aromas of green pear, melon, ruby grapefruit with a floral touch.  Fleshy fruit texture with a nice citrusy core and refreshing finish.

entry.title: Les Vignerons 3 Messes Basses Rose
entry.summary:
Vendor: Barriques WBS
Type:
Price: 10.99

2018 - Clean fruity and floral bouquet with hint of acid drop when aerated.  This is a fresh and fleshy dry rosé with a crisp mouth, supple and light, with expressive perfumes of red fruits and berries. Fantastic for the price.

entry.title: Luchador Tempranillo Toro
entry.summary:
Vendor: Barriques WBS
Type:
Price: 16.99

2016 - The Tempranillo grapes in this wine come from the dry, arid hillsides of Spain's Toro region.  The warm dry season ripens the grapes to a deep, rich red color with deep purple velvety core.  Aromas waft off this wine full of ripe black raspberry, plum, black cherry, dusty vanilla spice.  It features a lush palate with an inky texture and full of plummy red berry fruits and round soft tannins.  This is a juicy, fun kick around wine you can also pair up with a red sauce lasagna, hamburger or pizza night.  Limited quantity available.
